enb_long_title: Seventeenth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
sentences: This agenda item was addressed at the end of the day on Thursday, 5 April.
Rajendra Pachauri, Chair of the Ad Hoc Group on Communication Strategy, gave a presentation on the development and use of the IPCC website, noting a rapid rise in the number of hits.

He noted seminars and workshops held and called for further outreach to disseminate information on the work of the IPCC. One delegate requested that the material on the IPCC website, especially the TAR SPMs, be made available in all UN languages.
